# VEHICLE::SET_VEHICLE_CAN_LEAK_PETROL

## Summary
Allow a MISSION vehicle to leak petrol

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** val

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Sets whether a vehicle can leak petrol
